home.description1: I am {{age}} years old and live in Necochea, Argentina.
home.description2: I am an advanced student in the Technical Degree in Computer Application Development (TUDAI) at the Universidad Nacional del Centro de la Provincia de Buenos Aires (UNICEN).

university.title: University Technician in Computer Applications
university.description: Advanced student of the TUDAI program at UNICEN. I have a strong foundation in programming and I'm currently in the final stage of the degree.

technician.title: Professional & Personal Computer Technician
technician.description: Graduated from EEST NÂ°3 as a Professional and Personal Computer Technician. Gained skills in development, hardware maintenance, and network management.

javascript.title: JavaScript Mastery Course, Udemy
javascript.description: I have completed a JavaScript Mastery course on Udemy, where I deepened my skills in this fundamental language for web and application development.

frontend.title: Frontend Development Course, New Times
frontend.description: I completed a Frontend Bootcamp where I learned to build modern websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular.

description.part2: I have gained experience and skills in a variety of technologies.
